security: Sharing the names of possible contacts given to/DEVISTA-1 might endanger those individuals.
summary: This cable directs the station to provide only the first four names from reference SALY 4839 to /DEVISTA-1 if PCI does not give /DEVISTA-1 contacts in El Salvador.
summary_one_paragraph: This priority cable, dated 130022 45z, instructs the recipient that if PCI (likely a person or department) doesn't provide /DEVISTA-1 with contacts in El Salvador, the station should only pass the first four names listed in reference SALY 4839 (detailed in IN 63096) to /DEVISTA-1. A WH/COMMENT suggests Communists as possible contacts for /DEVISTA-1.
title: Cable regarding contacts for /DEVISTA-1 in El Salvador
